Text.Page:
The tuwangis keep wandering out of their area. It was all fine and good until they started attacking our soldiers.

There's just nothing to be done about them! I can't talk to them, but killing them seems...extreme. They're almost people!"Is there no other way?"

Well, now that you mention it, I've heard rumors from herb gatherers here and there that there is actually a potion that allows the drinker to speak the tuwangi language.

If the ingredients I heard were right, I'll need {@LinkCreature:205#1023#Quagmire Herb Sap} and {@LinkCreature:5#5#Muddy Sporewalker Mucus}.

Not pleasant to handle, but easy enough to find. What do you say?
(This quagmire herb has fresh, healthy leaves. It looks to be exactly what you were asked to gather.)

Wow. I forgot how terrible that stuff smelled! And you want me to do what with it? Hrm.

Well, since it's for Jaedon, go ahead and give it here.
Do you have what I need?
